title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 19 May 2008 - XWiki
content:
xwikibot - (19/05/2008 08:18): XWiki.RobertMcLauren was modified by XWiki.RobertMcLauren (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/RobertMcLauren  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 11:08): ok I only have to finish migrating the GWT servlet code to the new ThreadLocal stuff and I'll be able to commit my huge patch...  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 11:24): jvelociter\_: hi  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 11:24): Hi vmassol   
vmassol - (19/05/2008 11:24): I'm going to modify some GWT init code  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 11:24): ok  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 11:24): but I see we don't have any tests in XE for GWT  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 11:24): in trunk ?  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 11:24): yes in trunk  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 11:25): we don't have any GWT used in XE  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 11:25): should I use XWatch tests to verify it continues to work?  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 11:25): I mean will that be good enough, do we have enough tests?  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 11:25): you can use the only XWatch test, yes  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 11:25): we don't have much tests, unfortunately  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 11:25): this concern ThreadLocal ?  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 11:25): yes  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 11:26): ah right there's only one test... ouch not enough  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 11:27): so the only test we have is good for that, since it requires a working GWT message tool, which needs a XWiki context if I'm not wrong  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 11:27): I don't think curriki has more tests though  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 11:27): yes but that's about velocity context not xwiki context  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 11:28): I guess I'll need to bring up the watch app and verify it works  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 11:28): ok  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 11:29): I'll check the commit in my mailbox, I can give you a hand verifying  
xwikibot - (19/05/2008 11:31): Community.DebugXEWithEclipse was modified by xwiki:XWiki.ThomasMortagne - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/DebugXEWithEclipse  
xwikibot - (19/05/2008 11:31): Drafts.DebugXEWithEclipse was modified by  - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/DebugXEWithEclipse  
xwikibot - (19/05/2008 11:31): Community.DebugXEWithEclipse\_WebStart was modified by xwiki:XWiki.ThomasMortagne - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/DebugXEWithEclipse\_WebStart  
xwikibot - (19/05/2008 11:31): Drafts.DebugXEWithEclipse\_WebStart was modified by  - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/DebugXEWithEclipse\_WebStart  
xwikibot - (19/05/2008 11:31): Community.DebugXEWithEclipse\_ImportJarProjects was modified by xwiki:XWiki.ThomasMortagne - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/DebugXEWithEclipse\_ImportJarProjects  
xwikibot - (19/05/2008 11:32): Drafts.DebugXEWithEclipse\_ImportJarProjects was modified by  - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/DebugXEWithEclipse\_ImportJarProjects  
xwikibot - (19/05/2008 11:32): Community.DebugXEWithEclipse\_WebDependencies was modified by xwiki:XWiki.ThomasMortagne - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/DebugXEWithEclipse\_WebDependencies  
xwikibot - (19/05/2008 11:32): Drafts.DebugXEWithEclipse\_WebDependencies was modified by  - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/DebugXEWithEclipse\_WebDependencies  
xwikibot - (19/05/2008 11:32): Community.DebugXEWithEclipse\_MirrorWeb was modified by xwiki:XWiki.VincentMassol - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/DebugXEWithEclipse\_MirrorWeb  
xwikibot - (19/05/2008 11:32): Drafts.DebugXEWithEclipse\_MirrorWeb was modified by  - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/DebugXEWithEclipse\_MirrorWeb  
xwikibot - (19/05/2008 11:32): Community.DebugXEWithEclipse\_CreateWeb was modified by xwiki:XWiki.ThomasMortagne - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/DebugXEWithEclipse\_CreateWeb  
xwikibot - (19/05/2008 11:32): Drafts.DebugXEWithEclipse\_CreateWeb was modified by  - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/DebugXEWithEclipse\_CreateWeb  
xwikibot - (19/05/2008 11:32): Community.Debugging was modified by xwiki:XWiki.ThomasMortagne - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/Debugging  
xwikibot - (19/05/2008 11:33): Community.Debugging was modified by xwiki:XWiki.ThomasMortagne - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/Debugging  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 11:34): jvelociter\_: thanks  
xwikibot - (19/05/2008 11:34): Community.DebugXEWithEclipse was modified by xwiki:XWiki.ThomasMortagne - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/DebugXEWithEclipse  
xwikibot - (19/05/2008 11:36): Community.DebugXEWithEclipse was modified by xwiki:XWiki.ThomasMortagne - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/DebugXEWithEclipse  
xwikibot - (19/05/2008 11:37): Drafts.DebugXEWithEclipse was modified by xwiki:XWiki.ThomasMortagne - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/DebugXEWithEclipse  
xwikibot - (19/05/2008 11:37): Community.DebugXEWithEclipse was modified by xwiki:XWiki.ThomasMortagne (Deleted object) - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/DebugXEWithEclipse  
xwikibot - (19/05/2008 11:39): AdminGuide.Authentication was modified by xwiki:XWiki.VincentMassol - http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/Authentication  
xwikibot - (19/05/2008 11:40): AdminGuide.Authentication was modified by xwiki:XWiki.VincentMassol - http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/Authentication  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 13:47): hi there  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 13:47): doesn't anyone know why someone has commented out the source generation for gwt for the 1.4 branch?  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 13:47): this is making the build fail on my machine and on Continuum  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 13:47): :(  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 13:47): it doesn't make any sense to me to comment this out  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 13:48): I vaguely remember someone commenting it out for doing a release but I don't know why it was done, especially since it works fine for me to release without commenting this out.  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 13:49): just checked the svn logs  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 13:49): looks like thomasmortagne is the culprit :)-  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 13:49): (hmm or jv not sure whom yet, still hunting)  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 13:50): thomasmortagne, jvdrean\_ : if you could explain why this is commented out this would be great   
thomasmortagne - (19/05/2008 13:52): vmassol: sorry, I forget to uncomment it  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 13:52): thomasmortagne:  the question is why you had to comment it out?  
thomasmortagne - (19/05/2008 13:52): vmassol: the problem is that in release maven failed because we generate the sources two times  
thomasmortagne - (19/05/2008 13:53): one because or root xwiki pom  
thomasmortagne - (19/05/2008 13:53): and one in the gwt pom  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 13:53): oh that's easy to fix  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 13:53): let me check quickly the poms  
thomasmortagne - (19/05/2008 13:54): ok thanks  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 13:56): hmm not asa easy as I thought  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 13:56): thomasmortagne: I wonder if it's not simply because we didn't have any id defined in the gwt pom.xml  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 13:57): I'm adding             <id>attach-gwt-sources</id> now  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 13:57): however it's probably going to continue to fail since the 2 executions will be run  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 14:21): jvelociter\_:  the watch build still doesn't work for me... http://rafb.net/p/jtZJRX89.html   
vmassol - (19/05/2008 14:21): looking at it now  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 14:23): btw there are tabs in gwt/pom.xml .... they must be replaced by spaces  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 14:23): there's also a commented out resources section  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 14:23): with no explanation why it's commented out  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 14:23): could you remove it if it's not needed?  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 14:25): also it looks like the gwt compiler is running twice  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 14:26): and mvn install in watch/gwt doesn't install the generated zip...  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 14:26): http://rafb.net/p/W4y7lt72.html  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 14:29): vmassol: ok I've read that  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 14:30): I remove the comment now  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 14:30): It's not needed anymore  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 14:32): looking at the gwt build now  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 14:34): thanks  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 14:34): vmassol: for me it install the zip  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 14:34): http://rafb.net/p/YT8eQa94.html  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 14:34): and the compiler run only once  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 14:35): I'm using maven 2.0.9  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 14:35): I'm on the old snapshot  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 14:35): that's probably why  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 14:35): ok, I will upgrade mvn  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 14:42): vmassol: installed maven 2.0.9, and reproduced the 2 issues  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 14:42): I will try to fix that now  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 14:42): ok thanks  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 14:52): Interesting.. looking for "gwt maven 2.0.9 pom.xml" in google brings XWiki dev as 5th result  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 14:53): :)  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 15:15): hi dward   
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 15:26): vmassol: in fact it's not just the mvn compiler that run twice, it's the whole gwt module  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 15:41): jvelociter\_: here's my patch (untested for now - I'll now try building Watch with 2.1-SNAPSHOT): http://rafb.net/p/SXU4FW78.html  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 15:42): ok thanks  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 15:43): Will do that too for now, as I could not fix the build yet  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 15:58): it seems I'm making a bad use of the assembly plugin  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 15:59): jvelociter\_: it's not working with the latest 2.1-SNAPSHOT I had published either  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 15:59): same result  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 15:59): vmassol: yes thomasmortagne told me that. I suppose mine was older  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 16:01): this is painful :(  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 17:04): jvelociter\_: the gwt selenium test fails for me but I don't know if it's because of my change or not: http://rafb.net/p/dj8R6555.html  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 17:04): does it work for you without my patch applied?  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 17:04): testing now  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 17:05): seems to be working on Continuum  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 17:08): I'll try to start watch manually now  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 17:08): ok  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 17:08): running....  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 17:10): working for me too  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 17:10): I finish something now, and then try your patch  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 17:10): jvelociter\_: hmm the home page of watch is not very inforùative  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 17:10): informative  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 17:11): how do you access the watch application?  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 17:11): you have a link on in the floating box on the left  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 17:11): ahh  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 17:11): you mean Main.WebHome  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 17:11): yes we have to do something about it. I already told Anca  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 17:11): go in the Watch/ space  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 17:12): ok  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 17:56): jvelociter\_: I think I got it working  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 17:56): I have only these 2 logs: http://rafb.net/p/47Gnym89.html  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 17:56): cool  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 17:56): they don't seem related to my change  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 17:56): vmassol: this is not new  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 17:56): would be good to remove them  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 17:56): I tried to do something about it couple of weeks ago  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 17:56): could not succeed yet  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 17:56): in fact  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 17:57): it would be great I solve that, as using the proper policy files would improve performances IMO  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 17:57): other solution is wait for gwt 1.5  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 17:58): ok  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 18:00): jvelociter\_: btw is this version supposed to be close to finished. I can see several issues  
xwikibot - (19/05/2008 18:08): DevGuide.Creating a form with validation and tooltips was modified by xwiki:XWiki.Sergiu (Escape a regular expression that gets turned into a bold) - http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/DevGuide/Creating+a+form+with+validation+and+tooltips  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 18:16): vmassol: What issues ? can you quickly tell me so that I can update JIRA if needed. (btw, I'm not watch lead any longer, even though I'm still dedicated to help since Anca has been/is taken by school for a couple more weeks)  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 18:16): the icons are not placed correctly  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 18:16): there are 3: the one for adding feeds and such  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 18:17): and the text analysis + press review ones  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 18:17): there's a "Related actions:" title but not related actions listed  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 18:17): the flashing 0 Articles/20 New Articles looked strange at first hand, I now understand it  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 18:18): the date filters should be folded by default IMO, they take too much space  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 18:18): The Enter key does not work (for ex on search or when adding a feed)  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 18:18): I'll stop here  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 18:21): jvelociter\_: is anca logged here usually?  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 18:21): (I don't recall)  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 18:21): sometimes  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 18:22): vmassol: ok, cool they are "UI bugs mainly"  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 18:22): yes  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 18:25): vmassol: is the recordbot working ?  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 18:26): is it not?  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 18:27): :)  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 18:27): I don't know  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 18:28): http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/IRC/xwikiArchive20080519  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 18:28): the page is empty, despite its version 153.1  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 18:29): seems to be working  
vmassol - (19/05/2008 18:29): http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/IRC/xwikiArchive20080518  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 18:29): I will c/c your comments, to be sure   
vmassol - (19/05/2008 18:29): maybe it's saved once per day?  
jvelociter\_ - (19/05/2008 18:29): I don't know  
xwikibot - (19/05/2008 20:37): DevGuide.velocityHqlExamples was modified by xwiki:XWiki.Sergiu (Little explanation of what "use" means for the public API) - http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/DevGuide/velocityHqlExamples  
xwikibot - (19/05/2008 20:43): DevGuide.velocityHqlExamples was modified by xwiki:XWiki.Sergiu (Minor typo) - http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/DevGuide/velocityHqlExamples  
xwikibot - (19/05/2008 20:45): Sandbox.test was modified by xwiki:XWiki.Sergiu - http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Sandbox/test  
xwikibot - (19/05/2008 20:45): Sandbox.test was modified by  - http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Sandbox/test  
xwikibot - (19/05/2008 20:47): DevGuide.velocityHqlExamplesMacro was modified by xwiki:XWiki.Sergiu (empty save) - http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/DevGuide/velocityHqlExamplesMacro  
xwikibot - (19/05/2008 23:45): XWiki.edvjar was modified by XWiki.edvjar (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/edvjar
